Interests

Apart from my love of technology, I am also passionate about archery. I practice almost every day, and compete in local archery competitions every year.

I also love video games! Some of my all time favorites include "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim", "The Witcher 3", "League of Legends" and "Tom Clansy's Rainbow Six Siege". But recently my favourite games have been virtual reality games such as "Beat Saber" and "Brass Tactics Arena".
